name: Dark Day Afternoon
description:
[THIS IS A BETA/EARLY BUILD OF THE GAME]

[PRODUCT NOT FINISHED YET]

Dark Day Afternoon is a third person horror-survival game inspired by old style playstation horror games.

YOU ARE A COURIER WHO RECENTLY RECEIVED A SUSPICIOUS PACKAGE TO BE SENT TO A REMOTE LOCATION...

BUT WHEN YOU ARRIVE, THINGS TAKE A TURN FOR WORSE!
